Name: Metal War
About the game: This is a fast-paced top-down shooting and tower defense game. You need to customize and upgrade your chariot, build defensive structures to protect your base, explore the world and destroy all enemies! Don't forget to come back and defend when the enemy attacks! Can you make it to the end? Attack Master the operation of the chariot and destroy all enemies. Explore a variety of chariot module combinations, different enemies have different attack methods, more powerful enemies mean more generous rewards. Upgrade Each destroyed enemy drops useful components, bring them back to base to upgrade yourself. Explore a wide variety of chariot module combinations. Defense Enemies don't sit still, and you'll be attacked by increasingly stronger enemies over time. You can build a variety of defensive buildings to defend against enemy attacks. Explore Build speed roads and portals to hunt enemies further afield, destroy their bases, and bring back the loot. Balance the time to explore and back to defend, and don't forget to come back and defend before the enemy attacks.
